text: Amazing food cool staff, wraps are amazing especially the Buffalo sometimes when I'm in a rush I'll take it to go and just panini press it at home amazing post gym meal! They also have a bunch of cool different organic and natural products. P.s you gotta try the crunchy monkey shake !
Always good and always fresh! Try the wraps and shakes ! Staff will always suggest the right things to take to help you reach your dietary needs to reach goals wanted !
Awesome food, amazing smoothies (much better than Jugo Juice), great price. Awesome staff!!
